functions.name: CreateChannel
functions.desc: Creates a new channel to communicate between the client and the server

params.name: player
params.desc: The player that will own the connection

params.name: channelId
params.desc: The ID of the channel you want to communicate thru

functions.name: GetChannel
functions.desc: This method gets the channel if it exists in the cache

params.name: channelId
params.desc: The ID of the channel you want to communicate thru

functions.name: WaitForChannel
functions.desc: This method waits for the channel until the requested channel is ready to be listened to

params.name: channelId
params.desc: The ID of the channel you want to communicate thru

params.name: timeout
params.desc: How long until it gives up looking for the channel

functions.name: DeleteChannel
functions.desc: Removes the channel from the cache

params.name: channelId
params.desc: The ID of the channel you want to communicate thru

functions.name: _Fire
functions.desc: Fires the given channel id with the given arguments

params.name: channelId
params.desc: The ID of the channel you want to communicate thru
The remaining arguments that you want to pass on the call

name: ChannelService
desc: This contains a channel communication service. This is used by the ItemLifeCycle but it can be used for anything else
